text: Andrew Donald DeClercq (born February 1, 1973) is a former American basketball player. He played in the National Basketball Association (NBA) for ten seasons. He played for the Golden State Warriors, Boston Celtics, Cleveland Cavaliers and Orlando Magic. DeClercq played college basketball for the University of Florida. While in the NBA he averaged 4.8 points and 4.2 rebounds per game. ==References== == Other websites == * NBA.com: Andrew DeClercq Bio Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Boston Celtics players Category:Sportspeople from Detroit
title: Andrew DeClercq
